articles.title: Biden's preaching the benefits of democracy in Europe, but new concerns rise back home - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden's attempts to talk up democracy in Europe this week are facing headwinds from back home, where revelations about the Justice Department's attempts to obtain Democrats' data have raised new concerns about the state of American politics.

articles.title: A Fossilised Forest Creates a Picture of Our Ancient World - The Wire Science
articles.description: This petrified forest, El Bosque Perificado Piedra Chamana, is the first fossil forest from the South American tropics to be studied in detail.
articles.content:

articles.title: No emergency use, US FDA asks Bharat Biotech to obtain full approval - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ocugen, Bharat Biotech’s Covaxin partner in the US, “will no longer pursue an Emergency Use Authorization” of the vaccine in that country, the American clinical stage biopharmaceutical company told Nasdaq on Thursday.

articles.title: Study: Some smokers quit early in COVID-19 pandemic, others smoked more - UPI News
articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has affected American smokers in different ways, a new study finds. While some smoked more to help them cope with the crisis, others quit to reduce their COVID-19 infection risk.
